name: Behind My World
description:
It's a cooperative game that plays between two worlds. Constantly seeing your friend behind your walls, you must change perspectives constantly swapping between the worlds to advance and overcome the obstacles that you might find in the way. If you advance enough maybe you will be able to meet in the middle. With simple controls (movement with "w" "a" "s" "d" and arrow keys, and spacebar to swap between worlds), the focus it's in the puzzle aspect.

A game made for the MalagaJam and GlobalJam 2022.
